name: j2c
description: A tiny CSS in JS solution.

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run nyan
scripts.prepublish: (in-publish && npm run -s all && git push --follow-tags) || not-in-publish
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/j2c.commonjs.js -c -m --comments > dist/j2c.commonjs.min.js && uglifyjs dist/j2c.amd.js -c -m --comments > dist/j2c.amd.min.js && uglifyjs dist/j2c.global.js -c -m --comments > dist/j2c.global.min.js
scripts.lint: echo "linting..." && jshint dist/j2c.commonjs.js && jshint dist/inline/j2c.commonjs.js && jshint test/test.js

author: Pierre-Yves GÃ©rardy
